entry.title: zte_ct_x920 on ubuntu
entry.content:
android udev

adb devices

List of devices attached ???????????? no permissions

lsusb

Bus 001 Device 050: ID 19d2:ffda ONDA Communication S.p.A.

sudo vim /etc/udev/rules.d/51-Android.rules

SUBSYSTEM=="usb", SYSFS{idVendor}=="19d2", MODE="0666"

sudo chmod a+r /etc/udev/rules.d/51-Android.rules sudo /etc/init.d/udev stop sudo /etc/init.d/udev start

then re-plug the cable

adb devices

List of devices attached X920_CT device
